name: Compile Hogan Template Online
tagline: Paste in your hogan (mustache) template and grab compiled output.
body:
### Compile Mustache Templates Online

Uses [http://twitter.github.io/hogan.js/](hogan.js) to compile templates in the browser.

## Template
<textarea id="template" style="width:100%;height:6em;font-family:mono;"></textarea>
<button>Do it.</button>

## Compiled
<textarea id="compiled" style="width:100%;height:6em;font-family:mono;"></textarea>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
